args:
When the trio goes to investigate Emile's
quarters, a gaggle of ghosts emerge from a
hidden staircase leading to the basement,
throwing everyone into a panic. As they try
using a servants' technique to force their way
through, the head butler suddenly stops them.

Despite many ups and downs, our intrepid heroes
passed the servant audition and were hired on at
Emile's manor. Now tasked with cleaning his
personal quarters, their chance to launch a true
investigation has finally arrived.

What lies hidden in Emile's private sanctum?
What could be the reason for his odd behavior?
Tension abounds as our triumphant trio rushes
onto the scene!
We finally made it to Emile's room!\nOooh, my heart is racing...
We must wake him, assist him in dressing,\nand send him to the dining room.
Once that is complete, we can search\nthis room for clues.
Right! Excuse us, Emperor, but... Huh?
He's not at his desk, and he's not in bed.\nHe's not...anywhere.
Yet I don't believe he was seen exiting\nthe room this morning. Perhaps he has\nfallen to the side of the bed?
Nope! Not there either!\n...Also not in this chamber pot.
Don't be daft! No one could fit into such\na small pot.
Still, perhaps this is a boon; we can\nnow proceed with our investigation\neven earlier than we'd hoped.
Okay! I'm gonna check the bookshelf!
Well, this is a huge mess. All these books\nhave overflowed onto the floor.
I'd better start by putting them back.\nThere...and there...and theeeere...
Huh? Hey, I heard a strange noise.
A hidden stairwell behind the bookshelf,\nis it? By what means did you uncover this?
I dunno. I just put a book back on the\nshelf and heard a weird click.
There must be a hidden button.\nExcellent sleuthing, Pia.

Now then! Seeing as Emile is not here and
was not seen leaving, I think we can safely
conclude he is located in this mysterious
hidden basement.
I hear a voice chanting something...\nA spell, perhaps? Could it be Emile?
That certainly sounds like Emile, but what\nmanner of spell could he be... Oh no.
I sense dark mana issuing from the\nbasementâ€”perhaps in response to\nthe spell! Now run, both of you!
WHEEE HEE HEE! FRIENDS! NEW FRIENDS!\nWE CAN HAVE A PARTY WITH THREE\nNEW FRIEEEEENDS!
FRIENDS! FRIENDS! LOVELY FRIENDS! \nLET'S HAVE A PARTY TOGETHER!
Pia! ...Confound it, I fear these ghosts are\nattempting to make us a part of some\ndark assembly!
Then I will force them back with my\npowers as the Shadowwyrm! Haaah!
IT HURTS! SCARY FRIEND! BAD FRIEND!\nFRIEND MAKING A MESS OF THINGS!
Whew! That's an amazing barrier, Zodiark.\nI think we can finally rest for a...
HARUMMMPH! WE WANT FRIENDS!\nMORE STAFF MEANS MORE FRIENDS!
Oh no! There's more and more ghosts on\nthe other side of the barrier! The whole\nplace is filling up!
ALL STAFF, ASSEMBLE! WE'RE CHANGING\nTHE PARTY VENUE! BIGGER ROOM NOW!\nNICE WIIIIIDE ROOM!
Wait! Did the two of you hear that?
Prepare for an impact!\nThey mean to transport us!
They seem to have relocated us to\nthe entrance hall. And what's more...
WHEE HEE! FRIENDS! FRIENDS HERE!\nNOW THE PARTY STARTS!
The ghosts from the basement are now\nscattered about the manor.
They're EVERYWHERE! I can't believe\nwe had this many ghosts under our\nfeet the entire time!
It seems our fears have become reality\nin the worst of ways. Clearly there is\nsome malefic force at work here.
And given that he was casting the dubious\nspell, there must be some relation betwixt\nEmile and these apparitions.
Could the power of these spirits be driving\nEmile to his bizarre behavior? Or did he\nactually summon them himself?
We'll need to enter that basement again\nif we hope to ascertain the truth.
I'm ready to go! Er, except...
WHEEE HEE! WHEE HEE! WHEEEE HEEEE!
The path to Emile's room has more ghosts\nthan a theater graveyard! How are we\nsupposed to get past them all?
Seeing as they are ghosts, combat would\nbe a rather fruitless pursuit.
Yeah, I have no idea how to fight a ghost.\nBoy, this is a real pickle...
Do not fret! For we are...servants.
Have you forgotten about servants'\ntechniquesâ€”specifically the intermediate\nskill I demonstrated for you?
That one with the strange incantation?
I am. The time has come to unleash...\nThe Adorbs Devotion Beam!
You truly think that skill will aid us in our\ncurrent predicament?
This technique exists for the sole purpose\nof protecting one's master from evil spirits.

We'll begin by having you observe me,
then have you mimic my actions, so that
you may learn to be an adorable cutie
butler. Ready?
SO BRIGHT! I'M BEING PURGED!\nBOOO, I SAY! BOOOOOO!
Did I not tell you it was a fine skill?\nNow do as I did, both of you.
Yes, well, that's very good for a...first try.\nLet us see what Zodiark can do.
I will try anything so long as it aids us...\nADORBS DEVOTION BEAM, VILLAINS!
HA HA HA HA! OH, NO! SO SCARY!\nI'M SHAKING IN MY BOOOOOOTS!
You mustn't have such open hostility\ntowards them. This technique requires\nlove for one's master above all.
For love is the linchpin of the servants'\ntechniques. Do you understand?
Ack! While we've been doing this,\nmore and more ghosts were showing up!\nThey're gonna flatten us at this rate!
It is too soon for such pessimism.
Remember why we came here.\nWhy we surmounted the audition.
It was all a result of our devotion\nand desire to save Emile!
While not the same devotion as a servant,\nthat love comes from the same place.
I suppose you're right; I've known how kind\nEmile can be ever since he said he liked\nour singing.
That's why I wanted to help him.\nAnd you think it's...love?
It certainly is. And for my part, being\nmerged with Aurelius causes me to\noverflow with a parent's love for a child.
Given those facts, I'm quite certain we can\nmaster the special skills Edward speaks of.
Now is the time for us to show our love,\nPia! Let's go!
BLAAAARGH! THE LOVE IS STRONG!\nSO STRONG!
IT'S SO PRECIOUS I CAN'T STAND IT...\nFAREWEEEEEELL...
Splendid work! Truly you have shown\nyour love for Emile this day.
The pair of you are already a set of\nsplendid servants.
Your guidance is appreciated, Edward.\nWith this, I too can be a cutie butler...\nI feel myself overflowing with devotion...
Now let us continue forth and save Emile!
So being a full-fledged servant has to do\nwith whether or not you can be adorable?\nWow, that's deep...
We made it back at last, and it appears\nthe spirits have vanished.
A prime opportunity. Let us hurry deeper\ninto the basement while we can!
You will do no such thing!
Emperor Emile is in the midst of being\nreborn, and I will not permit you to\ninterfere with that.
So you will stand in our way, then?\nVery well, I accept your... What?!
You must be eliminated for his wish to be\nfulfilled. NOT EVEN FRIENDS WILL BE\nALLOWED TO INTERFERE WITH THE PARTY!
He has taken leave of his senses.\nReady yourselves, both of you!
THE FUN PARTY WILL CONTINUE FOREVER!\nWHEEEEEE HEE HEE HEEEEE!
